basics.name: Aku Karhinen
basics.label: Doctoral Researcher
basics.summary: Doctoral researcher at Aalto University focusing on vibration analysis and deep learning for rotating machinery condition monitoring.

work.name: Aalto University
work.summary: Part of the ARotor laboratory in the Mechatronics research group, focusing on deep learning and vibration analysis for rotating machinery.
highlights: Developed deep-learning models for fault detection
Developed virtual sensing methodologies for ship thruster powertrain
Designed and implemented vibration data acquisition pipelines

work.name: Aalto University
work.summary: Supported research in the ARotor lab on mechatronics and condition monitoring.
highlights: Processed datasets and developed techniques for intelligent fault diagnosis

work.name: Aalto University
work.summary: Assisted teaching and grading for several undergraduate courses.

awards and grants.title: Personal grant
awards and grants.summary: Research grant awarded for doctoral studies related to maritime industry.

awards and grants.title: Personal grant
awards and grants.summary: Research grant awarded for doctoral studies related to finnish industry.

awards and grants.title: Yrjö and Senja Koivunen Foundation Grant
awards and grants.summary: Research grant awarded for doctoral studies in vibration analysis.

awards and grants.title: Dean's List
awards and grants.summary: Awarded for completing 60 credits in one academic year with a GPA ≥ 4.0.

awards and grants.title: Graduation with Honors
awards and grants.summary: Graduated with honors (GPA 4.5/5.0) on thesis 'Synthesising Rotating Machine Faults into Vibration Data with Generative Adversarial Networks'.

publications.name: Aalto Gear Fault datasets for deep-learning based diagnosis
publications.summary: Presented open-access datasets for gear fault detection using deep learning methods.

publications.name: Data-driven virtual sensor for powertrains based on transfer learning
publications.publisher: Bulletin of the Polish Academy of Sciences: Technical Sciences
publications.summary: Developed a transfer-learning–based virtual sensor for powertrain monitoring.

publications.name: Synthesising Rotating Machine Faults into Vibration Data with Generative Adversarial Networks
publications.summary: Doctoral thesis on using GANs to generate synthetic vibration fault data.

references.name: Ass Prof. Raine Viitala
references.reference: Thesis supervisor, ARotor Lab, Aalto University.

references.name: Dr. Jesse Miettinen
references.reference: Supervisor, ARotor Lab, Aalto University – oversaw doctoral research in vibration analysis.

references.name: Dr. Aleksanteri Hämäläinen
references.reference: Co-author and collaborator on multiple deep-learning condition monitoring publications.

projects.name: ARotor Lab Repository
projects.summary: Open‐source code and datasets for rotating machinery condition monitoring.
